target.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CellInformation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PCI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "diff")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: false)
  |> difference(
    columns: ["diff"],
    keepFirst: true
    )
  |> group()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.diff or r.diff != 0)

targets.query:
location = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Location")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "altitude" or r["_field"] == "latitude" or r["_field"] == "longitude")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> drop(columns: ["CI", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => not exists r.latitude)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
      

signal = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${api_call}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SSRSRP")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > -200)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < -10)
  |> drop(columns: ["CI", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    
PCI = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CellInformation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PCI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 50)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 70)
  |> drop(columns: ["CI", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
    


union(tables: [location, signal, PCI])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> group(columns: ["device"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "RSRP"})

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "${api_call}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "SSRSRQ")

iperf3 = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Iperf3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bits_per_second")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sender"] == "false")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)


PCI = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CellInformation")

union(tables: [location, iperf3, PCI])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Iperf3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bits_per_second")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sender"] == "false")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","connectingToHost", "_time", "_value", "streamIdx", "protocol"]) 
  |> group(columns: ["device","connectingToHost", "_time", "protocol"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["device","connectingToHost", "protocol"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 1000000000)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sender"] == "true")
  |> keep(columns: ["device","connectingToHost", "_time", "_value", "streamIdx", "protocol"]) 
  |> group(columns: ["device","connectingToHost", "_time", "protocol"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["device","connectingToHost", "protocol"])

location = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Location")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "altitude" or r["_field"] == "latitude" or r["_field"] == "longitude")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")

  |> drop(columns: ["CI", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
      
ping = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

iperf3 = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Iperf3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sender"] == "true")
  |> drop(columns: ["socket"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> rename(columns: {connectingToHost: "toHost"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: int(v: r._value/1000.0) }))
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "device"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {device: "_field"})

PCI = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CellInformation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "PCI")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 50)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 70)
  |> drop(columns: ["CI", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${Interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    


union(tables: [location, ping, PCI, iperf3])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
    |> yield(name: "mean")

rtt = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 1000)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")

icmp_seq = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "icmp_seq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")  


union(tables: [rtt, icmp_seq])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")   
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["rtt", "device", "icmp_seq", "toHost", "_time"])
    |> rename(columns: {rtt:"RTT", icmp_seq:"ICMP SEQ", toHost:"Target Host", _time:"Time"})

iperf3 = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Iperf3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /^${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sender"] == "true")
  |> drop(columns: ["socket"])
  |> rename(columns: {connectingToHost: "toHost"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with rtt: int(v: r.rtt/1000.0) }))
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "device"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {device: "_field"})

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CellInformation" and (r["_field"] == "MCC" and r._value == 999 or r["_field"] == "PCI"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 50)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value < 70)
  |> keep(columns: ["PCI", "device", "_time", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: 0, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Location")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "${device}")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last(column: "_time")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Location")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "altitude" or r["_field"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")
   |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "^${device}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Ping")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "icmp_seq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] =~ /${device:regex}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_name"] == "${data_source}")  
  |> rename(columns: {_value:"ICMP SEQ", toHost:"Target Host"})

list.definition:
customTagValues = (bucket, tag, predicate=(r) => true, start=v.timeRangeStart, stop=v.timeRangeStop) =>
  from(bucket: bucket)
    |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
    |> filter(fn: predicate)
    |> keep(columns: [tag])
    |> group()
    |> distinct(column: tag)

customTagValues(bucket: "${bucket}", tag: "measurement_name")
list.label: Measurement
list.name: data_source

customTagValues(bucket: "${bucket}", tag: "measurement_name")
